name: @techpivot/streaming-slack-notify-api-lambda-github-action
description: Lambda function that responds to requests by a GitHub action to start streaming logs
author: TechPivot

scripts.build:prod: yarn build && rm -rf ./dist && ncc build --minify --out dist src/index.ts
scripts.dist: yarn build:prod && node-lambda package -D dist/ -A dist/ -n api-lambda-github-action
